!Fishermen's Guild Member: Around the Elven Village,if you hunt *elder red keltirs, gray wolves, Kaboo Orc grunts, Kaboo Orc Fighters, dryads, hook spiders, lirien elders, dungeon skeleton archers, dark terrors and sukar wererat leaders* you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
